channel.title: OSCP on Cr0w's Place
channel.description: Recent content in OSCP on Cr0w's Place

item.title: GitHub - OSCP - PWK Repository
item.description: During my time at the PWK labs and for my OSCP preparation, I gathered a big amount of useful stuff that I want to share and make available to the community. With a huge amount of respect to the Offensive Security team, I will not disclose anything about the labs and the exam, but I will give general information and study lines for the young padawans out there who want to TRY HARDER!
